name: ids-enterprise
description: Infor Design System (IDS) Enterprise Components for the web
author: Infor Design

scripts.build:full: npm run clean && npm run build -- --types=iife,es && npm run minify && npm run build:verify
scripts.build:release: npm run clean && npm run build -- --types=iife,es && npm run minify && npm run zip-dist && npm run build:verify
scripts.clean: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:docs && npm run clean:app
scripts.clean:docs: rimraf app/docs/*.html && rimraf app/docs/components/*.html && rimraf docs/ids-website/dist*
scripts.e2e:ci: npm run webdriver:update && npx protractor-flake --max-attempts=1 -- test/protractor.ci.conf.js
scripts.e2e:ci:debug: npm run webdriver:update && npx protractor test/protractor.ci.debug.conf.js
scripts.e2e:local:bs: npm run webdriver:update && npx protractor test/protractor.local.bs.conf.js
scripts.e2e:local:debug: npm run webdriver:update && npx protractor test/protractor.local.debug.conf.js
scripts.eslint: npm run build:icons && npm run build:colors && npx eslint src test app
scripts.eslint:error-only: npm run build:icons && npm run build:colors && npx eslint --quiet src test app
scripts.eslint:log: npm run build:icons && npm run build:colors && npx eslint -o eslint.log src test app
scripts.lint:ci: npm run eslint:error-only && npm run mdlint && npm run stylelint
scripts.mdlint: npm run mdlint:docs && npm run mdlint:src
scripts.mdlint:docs: npx markdownlint docs/ && npx markdownlint README.md
scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run quickstart
scripts.stylelint: npm run stylelint:demo && npm run stylelint:src
scripts.test: npm run mdlint && npm run eslint && npm run stylelint && npm run functional:ci && npm run e2e:ci npm run e2e:puppeteer --
scripts.watch: npm run watch:js & npm run watch:scss
scripts.watch:js: nodemon --watch "src/" -e js --ignore dist/ --ignore app/ -x "npm run build:js" --on-change-only
scripts.watch:scss: nodemon --watch "src/" -e scss --ignore dist/ --ignore app/ -x "npm run build:css" --on-change-only
